# cra-template-pwa-typescript

An progressive web app template for [Create React App](https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app),
using TypeScript.

To use this template add `--template pwa-typescript` when creating a new app:

```sh
npx create-react-app my-app --template pwa-typescript
```

## Learn more

The [Create React App documentation](https://cra.link/PWA) has more details on using this template
to create your PWA.
